mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.auth_code FROM tb_users u INNER JOIN tb_rbac_user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN tb_rbac_roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN tb_rbac_role_menus rm ON r.id = rm.role_id INNER JOIN tb_rbac_menus m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1 AND r.status = 1
